name: They will do the talking
description:
They said you couldn't... they said you shouldn't. But you are not doing the talking anymore.

Take a deep look in They will do the talking, a solo dev Game Jam game made by clearly not an artist.

Try to destroy all the cities before you reach the turn limit.

There are probably a lot of bugs.

Music by Jim Hall (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/jim-hall/) and Eggy Toast (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/eggy-toast/) -  Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
